   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# Usage Examples"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## import"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "scrolled": true
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from sqlstring.sql_builder import InsertBuilder\n",
    "from sqlstring.sql_builder import SelectBuilder"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## SelectBuilder"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### from_table()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "'SELECT * FROM address;'"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 6,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "builder = SelectBuilder()\n",
    "builder.from_table('address').get_query_string()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### distinct()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "'SELECT DISTINCT * FROM address;'"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 7,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "builder = SelectBuilder()\n",
    "builder.from_table('address').distinct().get_query_string()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### column()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 16,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "'SELECT city, state_code FROM address;'"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 16,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "builder = SelectBuilder()\n",
    "builder.from_table('address').column(['city', 'state_code'])\n",
    "builder.get_query_string()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### where()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 10,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "\"SELECT * FROM address WHERE state_code = 'CA' AND city = 'Oakland';\""
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 10,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "builder = SelectBuilder()\n",
    "builder.from_table('address').where('state_code', '=', \" 'CA' \")\n",
    "builder.where('city', '=', \" 'Oakland' \", 'AND')\n",
    "builder.get_query_string()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### group_by()\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 11,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "'SELECT * FROM address GROUP BY city, state_code;'"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 11,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "builder = SelectBuilder()\n",
    "builder.from_table('address').group_by(['state_code', 'city'])\n",
    "builder.get_query_string()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": true
   },
   "outputs": [],

   ],
   "source": [
    "builder = SelectBuilder()\n",
    "builder.from_table('address').order_by(['state_code', 'city'], 'DESC')\n",
    "builder.get_query_string()"
   ]

   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### limit() and offset()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 15,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "'SELECT * FROM address LIMIT 100 OFFSET 200;'"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 15,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "builder = SelectBuilder()\n",
    "builder.from_table('address').limit(100).offset(200).get_query_string()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## InsertBuilder"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": true
   },
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "print('hi InsertBuilder')"
   ]
  }
